A

availableSurroundings(int) - Method in class MyFarm
This method checks if the tile is available for planting a tree.

B

This class is the view of the buy menu for the farmer types.

This constructor creates the buy menu for the farmer types.

C

Controller - Class in Unnamed Package
Magpapakasal-sa-A-farm is farming simulation game that runs on Java.
Controller() - Constructor for class Controller
This constructor runs the game.
currSeedIndex(JButton) - Method in class GameView
This method is used to get the index of the seed that is clicked
currTileIndex(JButton) - Method in class GameView
This method is used to get the index of the tile that is clicked It also sets the border of the tile that is clicked to white

D

dig(Tools, Tile) - Method in class Player
This method returns a boolean value whether a tile has been successfully dug by having enough obejectCoins.
disableButtons(int) - Method in class BuyView
This method disables the buttons of the farmer types that have already been bought.

E

endDay() - Method in class MyFarm
This method increments the day and updates the harvest time of the tiles It also checks if a tile should be withered or not.

F

FarmerType - Class in Unnamed Package
This class is used to store the data of the different types of farmers which are farmer (default), registered farmer, distinguished farmer, and legendary farmer.

This constructor assigns the values of each attribute.
fertilize(Tools, Tile) - Method in class Player
This method returns a boolean value whether a tile has been successfully fertilized.

plant(Seed, Tile) - Method in class Player

Player - Class in Unnamed Package
This class contains the necessary attributes of the player.
Player(FarmerType) - Constructor for class Player
This constructor assigns the name and initializes each attribute.
plow(Tools, Tile) - Method in class Player
This method returns a boolean value whether a tile has been successfully plowed For it to return a true value, the tile must not be plowed so it is not required to check if there is a crop on the tile since the tile will be already plowed.

R

reset() - Method in class Tile
This method resets the seed, isPlowed, water, fertilizer, harvestTime, and hasSeed variables to their default values

This class contains conditions of a certain tile in the farm.

This constructor initializes all the attributes to empty values.

This method is used to toggle the tool and seed buttons from being enabled or disabled

U

updateFarmerType(FarmerType) - Method in class Player
This method helps change the certain farmer type of the player by checking if the player has reached a certain level and has enough objectCoins to afford it.
updateFert() - Method in class Tile
This method increments the amount of times the tile was fertilized.
updatePlow() - Method in class Tile
The method acts as a toggle for the isPlowed attribute.
updateTime() - Method in class Tile
This method decrements the amount of days until the crop is ready to harvest.
updateWater() - Method in class Tile
This method increments the amount of times the tile was watered.
updateWithered() - Method in class Tile
This method updates if the plant currently on the tile is withered.
